name: Mylo
description:
Game for the Global Game Jam 2019.

Josie, a dark haired little girl, with fair skin and known by her beautiful brown dress, was sleeping with her pet Mylo. During that same night, Mylo suddenly woke up, looked at the window and saw a butterfly; with no hesitation, followed it. As soon as Josie woke up she missed the little kitten and searched for it in the house, but couldn’t find it. When she saw the open door, she immediately knew what had happened to Mylo and knew what she was supposed to do: go after her pet.
